casebody.data:
SIOUX TRIBE OF INDIANS v. THE UNITED STATES [No. C-531-7]

[Ante, p. 613; 318 U. S. —]

Indian claims; treaty of 1868; lands acquired by Government under Act of 1877; “taking”; “misappropriation”; authority of Congress.

Decided June 1, 1942; petition dismissed. Plaintiff’s motion for new trial overruled October 5, 1942.

Plaintiff’s petition for writ of certiorari denied by the Supreme Court April 19, 1943.
